name: Dustin Smith Presents: My First Game
name_original: Dustin Smith Presents: My First Game
description:
This is an early access game that I am simultaneously publishing on Steam. I wanted to practice my game design and development skills and learn the process for publishing on a platform like itch.io and Steam. 

There will by more content in the future, but I feel the game is in a place where I can upload an early access!
